ISSUE.TITLE: Activate CRON extension
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/extensions/pg_cron ## Describe the problem The documentation for activating the pg_cron extension using SQL states that we need to create the extension in the extensions schema. While this worked on the remote instance, this line failed locally. ## Describe the improvement As the SQL console hints, I had to use instead: `create extension pg_cron with schema pg_catalog;` ## Additional context I wanted to activate the extension through SQL so it is put in a migration file. The `supabase db reset` failed with what the documentation hints.
